alert.note: Alert for Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:21PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Big Horn County through 545 PM MDT... At 520 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Lodge Grass, or 33 miles north of Sheridan, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail with heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Big Horn County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
